1.title: Fight to Flight
1.plot: Get your heart racing as we take a ride in a souped-up Corvette and Amber flies her way through an RC airplane course. Later she fights her way to victory against a Bot Boxer, but not before a trip down memory lane to play your favorite arcade games.

2.title: Revamped Toys
2.plot: Out with the old and in with the new. Amber experiences some of our favorite toys with a modern spin. From tricked out Hot Rods to self-balancing Electric Skates, upgrades are certainly an old toys best friend.

3.title: Cars, Bikes and Boats
3.plot: Amber explores the hottest modes of transport around to find out what to gets you from A to B in style. Whether it's Horizons luxury super yacht or the latest edition in the Rolls Royce family, you'll certainly be impressed by these Boys Toys.

1.title: So Cal
1.plot: Tech savvy host Jenn Barlow is showing you some mind blowing toys for big boys. Badass bikes, yachts and the ultimate "man-cations" will leave you giggling like a child.

2.title: Fearless Florida
2.plot: Jenn Barlow is cruising' through fearless Florida showing you an exclusive look at the new luxurious Lazarra yacht, tricked out carts, the ultimate kit planes and plenty of other extreme machines.

3.title: Big Blimpin'
3.plot: Jenn Barlow is cruising' through fearless Florida showing you an exclusive look at the new luxurious Lazarra yacht, tricked out carts, the ultimate kit planes and plenty of other extreme machines.

4.title: Super Sport Seduction
4.plot: Hold on tight because Jenn Barlow is taking you on a heart-pounding ride in search of the most remarkable toys on the planet. From an aircraft of the future to the most expensive car in the world, these are the ultimate toys for big boys.

5.title: Hoosier Daddy?
5.plot: one of a kind amphibious vehicle to a plane that flies with no engine. This extreme show will have you re-evaluating your definition of the word "cool."

6.title: Auto-Palooza
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: What the Sheik?
7.plot: Ready for your exclusive pass into the ultimate playground for men? Jenn Barlow is heading to Dubai showing you the most opulent toys for big boys. From a million dollar mobile mansion to a gold plated Nissan GTR.

8.title: Hammer Time
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Are You Worthy?
9.plot: Gentleman, get your suits on. Jenn Barlow is taking you to the world's most extravagant event and showing you the most lavish toys you can buy. From a beautifully crafted sailing yacht to a sport car that is making James Bond jealous.

10.title: X-Rated
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

11.title: Running with the Bulls
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: El Fin
12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: Need for Speed
13.plot: Get ready gear heads, we're at the Festivals of Speed seeking out the fastest machines you can buy. From a super boat that's like a Bugatti of the beach to a whole helping of delicious dream cars.

2.title: Mecca for Man Toys
2.plot: If you like out-of-this-world cars and the newest gadgets, then wait until you see what we wrangled up on our second trip to Dubai at the Big Boys Toys Convention. Believe us when we say, this is the Mecca for all man toys.

3.title: Best of Show
3.plot: We're traveling the globe getting you into the worlds best events for toys. From a luxury event in Beverly hills to the most famous auto shows on the planet. We have the scoop on all the machines you're longing to have.

4.title: You Da Bomb
4.plot: Join host Jenn Barlow as she uncovers exclusive amphibious vehicles, pimped out bomb proof man caves, and unbelievable new ways to get across town.

5.title: What the Flux
5.plot: From ultimate hunting vehicles to customized grills and even a new extreme way to fly, we wrangled up some unrivaled machines that you won't see anywhere else.

6.title: Life's a Beach
6.plot: The Pebble Beach Concourse known for showcasing the top pedigree in performance . If you wanna see the rarest of cars or those with mind blowing price tags upwards of $10 million dollars.

7.title: Aviation Eye Candy
7.plot: BOYS TOYS TV SHOW featuring the EAA Airventure show, NASA, ATK, Hondajet, Cirrus Aircraft, AutoGyro, Safari Helicopters, Silverlight Aviation Trikes and more, in Oshkosh.

8.title: Frankfurt and Furious
8.plot: BOYS TOYS heads to Frankfurt for the International auto show.

9.title: We Fly High
9.plot: Looking for a show that brings you the freshest and innovative machines out there, we've got them. From an incredible flying water toy to a futuristic car that flies over traffic, Boys Toys has all the flyest toys you could dream of.

11.title: Fantasy in Motion
11.plot: Features the coolest toys out there, from drones, F1 cars and everything in between.

14.title: Motor Week Extravaganza
14.plot: Are you ready for the crem de la crem of all car events? We are heading to Motor Week for a gathering of the legends. From extravagant historical rides, to outrageous super cars; this is a collection of the most notable rides out there.

1.title: Adults Playground
1.plot: Host Amber Wyatt travels Vegas to smash cars with an excavator, and fire some of most well-known guns from your favorite video games. The, she road tests one of the sexiest motorbikes to the market and gives you an insider look at the world's first electric body board.

2.title: So Cal Cruising
2.plot: Host Amber Wyatt takes a ride down memory lane, as she cruises through the the canyons in a 1958 Rolls Royce. Then from the windy roads to these wonders on the water - the team check out what's hot at this year's So Cal Boat show. AND we show you the ultimate bar on wheels. It's called 'Bar-cycle' and it's seriously good fun.

3.title: Dare to be Different
3.plot: Host Amber Wyatt takes to the streets and the skies, discovering the latest in toys and technology. She checks out an eclectic collection of choppers designed by a modern day 'Mad Max', introduces us to a start-up ride-sharing service called 'Tesloop', talks about the latest in aviation advancements and road tests one of the most powerful and maneuverable electric skateboards about to hit the market - all before one epic Californian sunset.

4.title: Sandpit to Sea
4.plot: Host Amber Wyatt takes a spin in the closest thing you'll find to a brand New Defender. From the road to the sandpit, she sharpens her skills in a D5G Bulldozer. Then just as they prove toys don't need to go fast to have a fan base - the team amp up the energy in San Diego's most exhilarating jet boat.

5.title: Travel in Style
5.plot: Host Amber Wyatt receives an invite to an exclusive Cigar Company - catching a ride in a pimped out limo-bus on the way. Then it's back to Las Vegas, as we discover a world of marvelous machines outside of the casino. All before being among the first to test drive a brand new super car from Japan.

6.title: Speed, Luxury, Innovation
6.plot: Host Amber Wyatt explores the latest in speed, luxury, and innovation from all around the world. Starting with a heart-pounding 1800-Hp race buggy, to the latest luxurious vessels and 'multicraft', to rare cars rich in history and a German-engineered water toy.

7.title: Sit Back and Relax
7.plot: Host Amber Wyatt cruises the Californian Coast in style in an electric-powered vintage Volkswagen. Then, like Jordan Belfort, kicks backs and relaxes on a beautiful, luxury yacht. She wraps the day at an over the top golf course in Sin City and then unwinds at a bar - where she's served by robotic bartenders.

8.title: Water, Wheels and Axes
8.plot: Host Amber Wyatt has an exclusive insider look into SEMA, one of the world's premier car trade shows. She shows us some vehicles that aren't afraid to get a little wet and then heads to the range to release her inner rage, by throwing, chucking and hurdling razor sharp axes to the bulls-eye.

9.title: Fantastic Machines
9.plot: Host Amber Wyatt showcases fantastic machines and where to find them. First stop, a virtual reality arcade that is out of this world, then to Hollywood's hottest hot rod shop. Then we've found a company in Salt Lake City that creates innovative industrial robots and a business in Orange County, CA that hosts a wave simulator that allows you to surf in your backyard.

10.title: Big And Bad
10.plot: Host Amber Wyatt showcases fantastic machines and where to find them. First stop, a virtual reality arcade that is out of this world, then to Hollywood's hottest hot rod shop. Then we've found a company in Salt Lake City that creates innovative industrial robots and a business in Orange County, CA that hosts a wave simulator that allows you to surf in your backyard.

11.title: Coast to Coast
11.plot: Host Amber Wyatt showcases fantastic machines and where to find them. First stop, a virtual reality arcade that is out of this world, then to Hollywood's hottest hot rod shop. Then we've found a company in Salt Lake City that creates innovative industrial robots and a business in Orange County, CA that hosts a wave simulator that allows you to surf in your backyard.

12.title: Fort Lauderdale Finds
12.plot: Host Amber Wyatt visits the Sunshine State. From the thrill of riding jet Skis at the annual P1X Boat show, to floating down the Everglades in an air boat and bolt through downtown Miami on a one-wheeled electric unicycle, Florida doesn't disappoint.

13.title: More Than a Toy
13.plot: Host Amber Wyatt gets behind the quarter million dollar boat technology that has perfected the surf wave. In Maine, she rides a top of the line off-road wheelchair and steps inside a luxury garden office that is changing the way we work, then she back with our friends at Superformance to try out their latest drift car.

1.title: Spoiled
1.plot: Amber starts the season with a splash down in Miami riding the world's largest inflatable water-slide. Then, it's back to her old friends at Icon to see a meticulously restored Chevy 3100.

2.title: Water, Wings and Wheels
2.plot: Step back in time and tour some of the mightiest warplanes ever built. Then, take a speedy, but practical electric scooter for a ride down the beach. We also discover some boards that effortlessly glide over the water.

3.title: Hot off the Line
3.plot: Host Amber Wyatt trials four toys that you've never seen before. She takes to the air in a gyrocopter, travels to Miami to the debut of two brand new luxury yachts and visits a shop that creates beautiful, one-off motorcycles.

4.title: Travel Toys
4.plot: Host Amber Wyatt takes you around the world to see what toys are trending where. From those that take you high in the sky, to ones that take you down below and everything in between.

5.title: Evolving Toys
5.plot: Host Amber explores those traditional toys with a new twist. Think classic custom cars, souped up super yachts, birds with all the bells and whistles and pimped out carts.

6.title: Spy Toys
6.plot: Amber takes a look into toys that James Bond himself would approve. Whether you're driving down the highway,cruising on all terrain or docking in the local bay, these toys are certainly going to turn heads.

7.title: Amazing Abu Dhabi
7.plot: Prepare to be amazed because we have traveled to Abu Dhabi to capture the latest and greatest toys showcased in the jewel of the United Arab Emirates.

8.title: Dubai
8.plot: On this special episode of Boys Toys, Host Amber Wyatt travels to the Amaze Expo in Dubai to bring you the latest and greatest creations from all around the world.

9.title: High Performance Toys
9.plot: Host Amber Wyatt tests some of the highest performance toys covering all terrains.

10.title: Sports Styled Toys
10.plot: On today's episode, we are getting up close and personal with some of the finest sports toys on the planet. From electric waterboards to classic custom cars.

11.title: One Off Toys
11.plot: Get ready to be amazed because on today's show, we are going to show you a series of toys you might never have seen before.

12.title: All Shapes and Sizes
12.plot: On today's episode, we get up close and personal with toys of all shapes, sizes and speeds from electric karts to homes on wheels.

13.title: Entertainment Business
13.plot: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to live like a star? Well today's your chance as we check out some of the entertainment industries finest toys from motion capture to musical instruments.

-1.title: Hotlanta
-1.plot: Features Atlanta's own High Museum of Art's Dream Car Exhibit and Atlanta Motor Sports Park. From the rarest dream rides to spine tingling race cars, Atlanta is filled with the hottest rides and experiences for guys. Consider this your VIP access to some high octane fun.

imdb.title: Boys Toys
plot: Join host Amber Wyatt as she takes to the streets, seas, and skies with today's hottest tech marvels. _Boys Toys_ (qv) take you inside the world of fast cars, private jets, luxury yachts, and the gadgets and gizmos of your dreams.
